EmailTemplate.name: 2013 Webinar Series.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Valentines Day Blog from MBO Partners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Enterprise Contact}},
It's Valentine's day again, so don't forget that in addition to your family and friends, your consultants should also be "feeling the love" on this special day. Check out my new blog about consultant happiness <http://www.mboenterprise.com/blog/it%E2%80%99s-valentine%E2%80%99s-day-are-you-showing-your-consultants-%E2%80%9C-love%E2%80%9D>.
Also, remember to register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/Feb19Webinar-ClientReadiness_RegistrationPage.html> for our February 19 webinar. We'll discuss how extending a little love to your contractors can pay huge dividends in the success of your IC engagement program.
Happy Valentine's Day! ___________________________________ MBO Enterprise Solutions t: 1-800-220-0469 e: sales@mboenterprise.com <mailto:sales@mboenterprise.com>
